name: Emergency Switch
description:
You have to protect your base while generating power for your ship.

Tip: You can take only 1 damage, while your base can take 10.

Controls:

Left and right arrow keys moves the ship

Up arrow key shoots (costs 15% energy)

A, D moves the captain

Spacebar uses the switch

Made for TriJam
